snippet.client:
import (
	context "context"
	fern "github.com/path-parameters/fern"
	fernclient "github.com/path-parameters/fern/client"
)

client := fernclient.NewClient()
response, err := client.User.GetOrganizationUser(
	context.TODO(),
	"organizationId",
	"userId",
	&fern.GetOrganizationUserRequest{},
)

import (
	context "context"
	fern "github.com/path-parameters/fern"
	fernclient "github.com/path-parameters/fern/client"
)

client := fernclient.NewClient()
response, err := client.User.GetUser(
	context.TODO(),
	"userId",
	&fern.GetUsersRequest{},
)
